get.description: Query whether a given domain is a valid bitly pro domain. Keep in mind that bitly custom short domains are restricted to less than 15 characters in length

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: A short domain. ie: nyti.ms.

get.description: Returns the number of clicks on Bitlinks pointing to the specified tracking domain that have occured in a given time period.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: A short domain. ie: nyti.ms.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

parameters.name: rollup
parameters.description: true or false. Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: an integer hour offset from UTC (-14 to 14), or a timezone string default: America/New_York.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.name: unit_reference_ts
parameters.description: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics, default: now.

get.description: Returns the number of links, pointing to a specified tracking domain, shortened (encoded) in a given time period by all bitly users.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: A short domain. ie: nyti.ms.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

parameters.name: rollup
parameters.description: true or false. Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: an integer hour offset from UTC (-14 to 14), or a timezone string default: America/New_York.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.name: unit_reference_ts
parameters.description: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics, default: now.

get.description: Saves a long URL as a Bitlink in a users history, with optional pre-set metadata. (Also returns a short URL for that link.)

parameters.name: deeplinks
parameters.description: urlencoded json array of deeplink items

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: A short domain. ie: nyti.ms.

parameters.name: longUrl
parameters.description: the URL to be saved as a Bitlink.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: a description of, or note about, this Bitlink.

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: indicating privacy setting (defaults to user-level setting).

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: the title of this Bitlink.

parameters.name: user_ts
parameters.description: timestamp as an integer epoch.

get.description: This is used to query for a Bitlink shortened by the authenticated user based on a long URL or a Bitlink.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: one or more Bitlinks to lookup.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: one or more long URLs to lookup.

get.description: Save a Custom Bitlink for a custom short domain.

parameters.name: keyword_link
parameters.description: the Custom Bitlink (short domain and keyword combination) to set

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Ovewrite existing entry if one exists. Default: false.

parameters.name: target_link
parameters.description: the Bitlink the specified keyword will map to (as returned from /v3/shorten)

get.description: lookup

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: one or more long URLs to lookup.

get.description: info

parameters.name: expand_user
parameters.description: optional true|false - include extra user info in response.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: refers to one or more bitly hashes, (e.g.: 2bYgqR or a-custom-name ).

parameters.name: shortUrl
parameters.description: refers to one or more Bitlinks e.g.: http://bit.ly/1RmnUT or http://j.mp/1RmnUT.

get.description: shorten

parameters.description: A short domain. ie: nyti.ms.

parameters.name: longUrl
parameters.description: the URL to be saved as a Bitlink.

get.description: Returns entries from a users link history in reverse chronological order.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: indicating whether or not link is to be archived.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: filter to return only links for the given campaign_id, can be provided multiple times

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

parameters.name: exact_domain
parameters.description: n exact domain to filter on history entries

parameters.name: expand_client_id
parameters.description: whether to provide additional information about encoding application. default: false.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: custom keyword to filter on history entries

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: one or more Bitlinks to lookup.

parameters.name: modified_after
parameters.description: timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: integer specifying the numbered result at which to start (for pagination).

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: indicating privacy setting (defaults to user-level setting).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: optional ad hoc text search string

parameters.name: root_domain
parameters.description: a root domain to filter on history entries

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: the user for whom to retrieve history entries (if different from authenticated user).
